nodes.text: Lucasfilm Games is a division of Lucasfilm dedicated to providing support to partners video game publishers and developers.

Lucasfilm Games was unveiled on January 11, 2021 on StarWars.com, quickly followed with the announcement of an Indiana Jones game on January 12, and a Star Wars game, from Massive Entertainment and Ubisoft, on January 13. Before this, the division was mentioned in the credits of Star Wars: The Old Republic: Onslaught, released on October 22, 2019, in Star Wars Insider 193, in an interview regarding Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order, published on October 30, 2021, and in a SWTOR.com article published on December 20.
On February 17, 2021, Lucasfilm Games and Zynga announced Star Wars: Hunters. Developed since 2018 by NaturalMotion, the game is planned to be released in late 2021.
